name: Save Image To Azure Blob
summary: Upload images from disk or the clipboard to Azure Blob Storage, and embed the resulting URL as an image link into the current document.
author: Rick Strahl, © West Wind Technologies

name: Paste Code as Gist
summary: Create a code snippet as a Gist that gets embedded into Markdown as a script link from Github
author: Rick Strahl, © West Wind Technologies

name: Snippets
summary: Create reusable text snippets with C# code expressions to embed into your documents.
author: Rick Strahl, © West Wind Technologies
